Travel - 1.schema_description: Each user can book one or more flights and hotels. Flights have different classes, and hotels offer various room types...

Number of bookings for each hotel.sql_query: SELECT h.hotel_name, COUNT(hb.booking_id) as bookings_count FROM hotel_bookings hb JOIN hotel_room_types hrt ON hb.room_type_id = hrt.room_type_id JOIN hotels h ON hrt.hotel_id = h.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_id ORDER BY bookings_count DESC

plot_params.plot_title: Number of bookings for each hotel

The number of bookings for each hotel.sql_query: SELECT h.hotel_name, COUNT(*) as booking_count FROM hotel_bookings hb JOIN hotel_room_types hrt ON hb.room_type_id = hrt.room_type_id JOIN hotels h ON h.hotel_id = hrt.hotel_id GROUP BY h.hotel_name ORDER BY booking_count DESC

plot_params.plot_title: Number of Bookings for Each Hotel
